title: Leadership Practical Skills Development: Student Technology-Enhanced Learning in Science Through Mixed Research Methodologies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and general digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Students can explain effective digital tool selection and utilization strategies in BYOD environments for science problem-solving.
Students can write reports analyzing technology-enhanced learning processes by applying mixed research methodologies (quantitative + qualitative).
Students can practice technology-based collaborative methods that enhance learning efficiency and connectivity, applying them to real science experiments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
